reviews.review: This game is addicting, it can be annoying at times, but it is fun.
I played countless hours off record of thee og cs and its amazing in every way, and then csgo came out and its better. so get it buy it right now play it now do it!!!!!!
Melhor Jogo FPs, e É isso!
e bom mas n desperdicem dinheiro  com skins
"I shoot gun, kill man, have fun." Welcome to the mind of a silver, me.

"Competitive" matchmaking is completely broken: full of smurfs, cheaters, and people who are just mucking around not even trying to win. Practically every game has at least one bot in it, because committing 30 minutes to a "competitive" game seems to be too much to ask. This would be a great game otherwise.
jogo desde as primeiras versões nas lan houses, jogo que perdura por mais de 15 anos.

Good stuff:
-It has many game modes(deathmach, casual, competitive...)
-Realistic physics.
-Good missions.
-Great skins, stivkers and graffitis but they can be expensive.
-Very good maps.
-Good rank system.

Bad stuff:
-Many toxic players.
-It had lot of cheaters, less now but they still pop up quite often.
-It does not have anti-cheat like facit has.

All in all great game, its sooooo much fun to play.
9/10 for me.
better than all of the other trash shooters that are out and its free.
yeni güncelleme ile oyun gayet güzel olmuş !!
